software_engineer.text:
JOHN DOE
Software Engineer
john.doe@email.com | (555) 123-4567 | linkedin.com/in/johndoe

SUMMARY
Experienced software engineer with 3 years developing web applications using React, Node.js, and Python. Passionate about creating scalable solutions and collaborating with cross-functional teams.

EXPERIENCE
Software Engineer, Tech Corp (2021-2024)
- Developed React applications for client projects, improving user engagement by 25%
- Collaborated with team of 5 developers using Git and Agile methodologies
- Implemented new features and bug fixes, reducing system downtime by 40%
- Led code reviews and mentored junior developers

Software Developer Intern, Startup Inc (2020-2021)
- Built RESTful APIs using Node.js and Express
- Worked with MongoDB and PostgreSQL databases
- Participated in daily standups and sprint planning

SKILLS
Programming: JavaScript, React, Node.js, Python, SQL
Tools: Git, Docker, AWS, Jenkins
Soft Skills: Team collaboration, Problem solving, Communication

data_scientist.text:
JANE SMITH
Data Scientist
jane.smith@email.com | (555) 987-6543 | linkedin.com/in/janesmith

SUMMARY
Data scientist with 2 years experience in machine learning, statistical analysis, and data visualization. Skilled in Python, R, and SQL with expertise in predictive modeling.

EXPERIENCE
Data Scientist, Analytics Corp (2022-2024)
- Built machine learning models that improved prediction accuracy by 30%
- Analyzed large datasets using Python, pandas, and scikit-learn
- Created interactive dashboards using Tableau and Power BI
- Collaborated with business stakeholders to define KPIs and metrics

Data Analyst, Research Institute (2021-2022)
- Conducted statistical analysis on research data using R and SPSS
- Created data visualizations and reports for stakeholders
- Maintained data quality and integrity standards

SKILLS
Technical: Python, R, SQL, TensorFlow, PyTorch, Tableau
Machine Learning: Classification, Regression, Clustering, NLP
Statistics: Hypothesis testing, A/B testing, Experimental design

product_manager.text:
MIKE JOHNSON
Product Manager
mike.johnson@email.com | (555) 456-7890 | linkedin.com/in/mikejohnson

SUMMARY
Product manager with 4 years experience leading product development from ideation to launch. Proven track record of delivering user-centric solutions that drive business growth.

EXPERIENCE
Senior Product Manager, Tech Startup (2022-2024)
- Led product strategy and roadmap for mobile app with 100K+ users
- Managed cross-functional team of 8 engineers and designers
- Increased user retention by 35% through feature optimization
- Conducted user research and A/B testing to inform product decisions

Product Manager, Enterprise Corp (2020-2022)
- Managed B2B SaaS product with $2M annual revenue
- Collaborated with sales and marketing teams on go-to-market strategies
- Defined product requirements and user stories for development team
- Analyzed market trends and competitive landscape

SKILLS
Product Management: Roadmapping, User research, A/B testing, Agile
Tools: Jira, Figma, Mixpanel, Google Analytics
Business: Market analysis, Competitive research, Go-to-market strategy
